headline: Does the Recent 17% Rally Signal a Turning Point for Estée Lauder in 2025?
summary: If you have been watching Estée Lauder Companies' stock and wondering whether now is the right time to buy, sell, or just hold on, you are definitely not alone. The share price story is one of those rollercoasters that gets investors talking and sometimes scratching their heads. Over the last year, the stock has dropped by 11.4%, and the longer-term decline is hard to miss, down a hefty 58.2% over the past three years. Even last month saw Estée Lauder's stock price slip by 5.5%...
